<p align="center">
    <img src="https://github.com/rose-pine/rose-pine-theme/raw/main/assets/icon.png" width="80" />
    <h2 align="center">Rosé Pine for GNOME Terminal</h2>
</p>

<p align="center">All natural pine, faux fur and a bit of soho vibes for the classy minimalist</p>

<p align="center">
    <a href="https://github.com/rose-pine/rose-pine-theme">
        <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/community-rosé%20pine-26233a?labelColor=191724&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&style=for-the-badge" />
    </a>
</p>

## Usage

> **Warning**: This will overwrite all previous profiles

```sh
# Load rose-pine.dconf or other variant
dconf load /org/gnome/terminal/legacy/profiles:/ < rose-pine.dconf
```

## Contributing

Modify `template.dconf` using Rosé Pine variables, then build variants:

```sh
npx @rose-pine/build@latest -s -f rgb-function -t template.dconf
```

_Generated by @rose-pine/build@0.4.0_
